attribute: Operators run their own nodes (no white labeling)

attribute: Operators earning enough to maintain a profitable business

comments: Withdrawals are automatic and permissionless + reward info here.

attribute: Withdrawal credentials are non-custodial and trustless
Node operators are disincentivized from acting maliciously
comments: Penalty system in place here. Malicious node attacks currently very rare

attribute: Rocket Pool DAO can’t suddenly change the validator set
comments: Decentralization of Rocket Pool prevents RPL holders from changing validators.

attribute: Rocket Pool governance has significant safeguards
comments: Governance has proven to be a robust safeguard for the decentralization of Rocket Pool up to this point.

attribute: Delegation is enabled in onchain Rocket Pool governance

comments: Anyone can become a Rocket Pool validator permissionlessly and create a Minipool.

attribute: No operator has more than 1% of total stake
comments: Top node operator has 1.6% of total stake. See here

attribute: Best practices in security and key management
comments: DVT conversations have occurred but this technology is yet to be fully implemented.

attribute: There’s a robust set of Rocket Pool governance delegates
